name: Machines
description: You can't have a tech mod without machines! These chapters will explain what each machines in Mekanism does. Machines consumes power to function, and Mekanism $(bold)by itself$() has no way to generate power (See Mekanism: Generators). Visit $(l:machines/general_gui)General Info on GUI's$(/l) for info about config settings almost all Mekanism machines have.
